go_data.justification: CD83 is expressed together with decysin in response to CD40 ligation and a mixed lymphocyte reaction, indicating its involvement in dendritic cell differentiation.
CD83 is a marker of mature dendritic cells and is upregulated by signals of activated T cells, indicating its involvement in immune system processes.
As a marker of mature dendritic cells, CD83 is likely located on the cell surface.
